experience.company: Amazon (Identity Services / CS Stores Fixed Corporate)
description: Designed Data Pipelinefor transferring data from DynamoDB to Amazon Data lake incorporating correct transformation layer and data correctness layer in pipeline.

Built an end-to-end Amazon Customer Service landing page using a React frontend and Spring-based Java backend with GraphQL data sources. The feature served 100K customers dailyand led to a measurable business impact — reducing customer service contacts and improving self-service resolution rates signiﬁcantly.
Created Order Cancellation ﬂow for Voice bot to trigger when a customer calls Amazon, designed graphql schemas to achive this and served around 10K customers daily worldwide.
Conducted JDK17 migration campaign across 28 packages.
Migrated FasttrackBI Portal completely from legacy code which was previously implemented in .NET framework and AngularJS to .NET 7 and React with eﬃciency of typescript.
As the server deals with a large amount of data for showing reports, query time was cut down by almost 30 percentand loading it eﬃ- ciently using React's virtual DOM.
Created Spring-based APIsfor and GraphQL queries to bind fron- tend and APIs with the data layer in between. Reducing the latency by a signiﬁcant amount and eﬃciently resolution of consumer queries.
Developed UI for a feature to enable users to upload an attachment related to its issue using React and Vanilla-js.
Built the company's education portal which would enable any org to conduct to run an institute online, from live classes to online tests and assignments.
Developed frontend using React and Redux.

projects.name: ISRO Safe Ship Nav
projects.description: Utilized ISRO's dataset to determine the optimal path for ships in deep sea navigation. Developed a comprehensive graph incorporating Geo-spatial data, including depth and wave height, sourced from ISRO.
